title: Statistics and Probability Education Course Utilizing Android-Based Performance Tasks

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computational skills and fundamental smartphone usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Statistics application education for non-IT students in vocational training institutions, conducted in a smartphone-centric technological environment, emphasizing practical skill enhancement through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Students can solve hypothesis testing problems with 80% accuracy using an Android app
Learners apply correlation and regression analysis concepts to real-world data through smartphone-based performance tasks
Learners complete an 8-week app-based project collaboratively with team members and visualize statistical results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
